ovdesc.p: This is a Parameter file that is used to produce the Tax returns.

It contains details about the Bank like Sort Code, Tax autorities Reference number etc and definition of various fileds including Local Reference fields that are used in the production of the Tax returns. The actual Tax Returns will be produced by another program which normally is different from site to site.

desc.p: The Unix directory where the output will be created as an ASCII file.
If the Tax returns have to be created as an ASCII file then the directory under which the file has to be created should be specified here.
Upto 25 character alphanumeric
Reserved for future use.
Noinput.
Reserved for future use.
Noinput.
Reserved for future use.
Fields ITEM.LABEL to ITEM.RES1 form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
Reserved for future use.
Noinput
Description of this record.
Multi language based multi value field.
1 to 35 character alphanumeric.
Used if Audit reports are required to be produced.

If any audit reports are to be produced, the Report control record associated with the report has to be input in this field and it must exist on REPORT.CONTROL file. If this field is not input, no audit report will be produced.
Upto 24 character alphanumeric.
Fields RETURN.NO to ACCT.CLASS.ID form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 15 characters may be entered.
Reserved for future use.
Start of Multi value set.
The T24 file from which the Tax Retuens will be produced.
Normally the BASE.FILE will be INT.MOVEMENT but it can be changed provided the Tax return program is amended accordingly. The file input in this field must exist on FILE.CONTROL.
Upto 24 character Alphanumeric data.
Fields ITEM.LABEL to ITEM.RES1 form a related multi value set. Standard T24 numeric field.
This is a NOINPUT field.
The Sort Code of this Bank/Branch.
The Sort code is given to each branch of the bank and it must be entered in this field so that it can be sent in the Tax Returns.
Must exist on BC.SORT.CODE file. Upto 10 character Alphanumeric.
Fields ITEM.LABEL to ITEM.RES1 form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 15 characters may be entered.
The T24 Application for which this LOC.REF.NAME applies to.
The Application defined here must exist in the PGM.FILE.
Any valid T24 Application.
Fields RETURN.NO to ACCT.CLASS.ID form a related multi value set. Standard T24 date field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
Fields ITEM.LABEL to ITEM.RES1 form a related multi value set. Standard T24 numeric field.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Fields ITEM.LABEL to ITEM.RES1 form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 25 characters may be entered.
The name of the Tax return as referred to by the system.

The program that produces the Tax returns will look in this field for the return name in order to get parameters for producing the Tax returns. For example the Inland Revenue Section 17 returns must be referred as "IR17". Start of a Multi value set.
1 to 10 character alphanumeric.
Reserved for future use.
Fields RETURN.NO to ACCT.CLASS.ID form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 24 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the REPORT.CONTROL file.
Reserved for future use.
End of Multi value set associated with REPORT.ITEM.
Noinput.
This field is reserved for future use.
Noinput.
Any records that are to be excluded from the Tax returns must be input here.
The item defined in this field must be defined as a valid label in the field ITEM.LABEL.
Upto 15 character alphanumeric.
The Reference Number allocated to the Bank from the Tax authorities.
The tax authorities allocate a reference number to each bank which must be quoted on the Tax returns. That Reference Number must be input in this field.
Upto 8 character Alphanumeric data.
Reserved for future use.
End of Multi value set associated with RETURN.NO field.
Fields ITEM.LABEL to ITEM.RES1 form a related multi value set.
A maximum of 2 characters may be entered.
The following values are permitted: EQ NE LT GT LE GE
The name of any Item used in the Tax Return production program must be defined here.

When the Tax returns are being produced, the system will look for certain Report Items and their values which must be defined in this field. The report Items required for the Tax return program will be described in the documentation for that program.
Upto 50 character alphanumeric.
This field is reserved for future use.
Noinput.
The date on which the current tax year ends.
Standard date format.
Name of a Loacl Reference field as referred to in the Tax returns.

The Name specified in this field will be used by the system while producing the Tax returns to determine from which application and field the data has to be extracted. Start of a Multi value set up till LOC.REF.POS field.
Upto 50 character Alphanumeric.
The Full name of the Bank as recogonised by the Tax authorities.
The data input in this field will be used in the Tax returns.
Upto 50 character Alpha numeric data.
Reserved for future use.
Noinput
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 25 characters may be entered.
The current tax year must be specified here.
The current Tax year is held on this field.
Upto 4 character numeric.
Any records that are to be included from the Tax returns must be input here.
The item defined in this field must be defined as a valid label in the field ITEM.LABEL.
Upto 15 character alphanumeric.
Fields RETURN.NO to ACCT.CLASS.ID form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 15 characters may be entered.
The value of the defined REPORT.ITEM must be entered here.

The value that has to be used by the Tax Returns program for the Report Item defined in the earlier field has to be input in this field. Thsi field is sub valued and associated with the earlier field (REPORT.ITEM).
Upto 50 character alphanumeric.
The ASCII file name where the Tax returns are to be held.
The file name input in this field will be created as a Unix fiel under the directory specified in the earlier field and the Tax returns will be created in this file.
Upto 25 character Aplhanumeric data.
Identifies the company for which this Parameter rescord applies.
The company entered in this field must exist on the Company file and must be a normal processing company.
Standard T24 Company ID format.
The date from which the current tax year started.
Standard date format.
Fields ITEM.LABEL to ITEM.RES1 form a related multi value set. Standard T24 numeric field.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Reserved for future use.
Noinput.
The Branch name for which the Tax returns are to be sent.
The Branch Name entered in this field will be sent on the Tax Returns.
Upto 50 character Alphanumeric.
Field which decides if tax reporting file has to be updated for each tax entry raised from a transaction
When set to YES, system would update ST.TAX.REPORT.DETAILS file with tax details for each T24 financial transaction which raises tax entries
When set to No/None - no tax details update would happen
Input either YES or NO
This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
Reserved for future use.
Noinput.
Reserved for future use.
Noinput.
Reserevd.
Reserved.
